meta.title: WalkScape | Roadmap
meta.description: An outline of the development arc of WalkScape, both past and future.

devStart.title: Game Development Starts
devStart.content: The development of WalkScape starts as a hobby project, that Schamppu works on in his free time.

maxchill.title: Maxchill Joins the Team
maxchill.content: The project starts to gain popularity online, especially on Reddit, and the need to recruit an artist arises. Maxchill joins the development team.

originalBeta.title: Original Closed Beta Launch
originalBeta.content: The first version of the WalkScape closed beta is scheduled to launch during the Summer of 2023. This proves an unrealistic schedule, and the release has to be delayed until the end of the year.

floursifter.title: Floursifter Joins the Team
floursifter.content: Floursifter, a member of the WalkScape community who contributed a lot of his free time to come up with content, in-game formulas and iOS development version testing, joins the team unofficially.

wave1.title: Invite Wave 1 for Supporters
wave1.content: To guarantee access to the first Closed Beta version of the game, players can support the development of WalkScape on Patreon and Buy Me a Coffee.

launch.title: Closed Beta is Released
launch.content: WalkScapeâ€™s first Closed Beta version is released.

qol.title: Large QoL Update
qol.content: A large quality of life update is released. The whole UI is reworked and navigating and playing the game becomes significantly easier.

contentUpdate.title: Major Content Update
contentUpdate.content: The amount of in-game content is almost doubled by adding collectibles, new items, twice as many activities, and more to prepare for the launch of Wave 2.

wave2.title: Invite Wave 2
wave2.content: The second Wave of Closed Beta invites ends on 31st of March, 2024. Pateron and BMAC supporters and a large amount of players who had applied to the Closed Beta gain access before the cutoff date, 31st of March.

wave2patch.title: Post Wave 2 Patch
wave2patch.content: An update is released to fix new problems encountered by players who joined in wave 2.

myzozoz.title: myzozoz Joins the Team
myzozoz.content: In order to speed up development, a search for a second programmer and developer is started. On the 15th of April, myzozoz starts as the first official employee of Not A Cult.

pedometer.title: Pedometer Update
pedometer.content: By now the core feature of WalkScape, counting steps, is in need of updating. An update is released fixing a lot of issues people encountered with the pedometer. Progress on fixing the pedometer continues throughout May, 2024.

wave2point5.title: Invite Wave 2.5
wave2point5.content: As a thank you to all players who have supported the game since the end of invite wave 2, invites will be sent out to everyone who supports the game on Patreon or BMAC before the 15th of June, 12:00:00 UTC. Invites will start rolling out on the  1st of June.

syrenthia.title: Syrenthia Update
syrenthia.content: Our biggest update yet, adding achievements, realm reputation, consumables, and a new region to the game.

wave3.title: QoL & Wave 3
wave3.content: Another large Quality of Life update, adding WalkPedia, travel + action queue, bank & inventory sorting, tabs, and a lot more to make playing the game easier. Shortly after QoL update is released and any issues with it fixed, Wave 3 begins.
